SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class SerializableOptional<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.SerializableOptional<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of the value
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SerializableOptional<T> extends Object implements Serializable
Re-implementation of the Optional but serializable.
If the value is ot null isEmpty return false, and the isPresent returns true.

The methods in the class are a copy of the original methods.
The only method different from the original is of(T value), which if the value is null return an empty SerializableOptional otherwise returns a SerializableOptional with its value equals to the value passed.

There aren't present the method ifPresent, ifPresentOrElse, filter, map, flatMap, or, stream, orElseGet and orElseThrow.
See Also:

      public static <T> SerializableOptional<T> ofNullable(T value)
